import React from 'react' import './signup.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import { userSignUpSchema } from '../../validation/formValidation' function SignUp() { const {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm({ resolver:yupResolver(userSignUpSchema) }) const signUpSubmit=(data)=>{ console.log(data); } return (
